text: Sarai Alamgir railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Sarai Alamgir village, Gujrat district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Gujrat District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Sarai Alamgir railway station
